Young voter registration spikes to record numbers in 48 hours after Harris takes helm  —  New voter registration spiked to record levels in the first 48 hours after president Joe Biden ended his presidential campaign.  —  The nonpartisan Vote.org website saw its highest level …

It's time to talk about Donald Trump's age  —  At 78, former President Donald Trump is now the oldest presidential nominee in American history.  If he wins re-election in November, Trump will end his term just a few months shy of his 83rd birthday, making him two years older than President Joe Biden is now.

The Most Important Speech Joe Biden Will Ever Give  —  The president faces difficult questions when he explains his decision to drop his reelection bid but finish his term.  —  Not only will Joe Biden not be a two-term president — now he needs to convince the American public that he's up to the job for another six months.
